Message.Title: Inaccurate gripper moving
Message.Description:
Task:
Hand_ moved with minor error and it's ignored.
Context:

Message.Title: Gripping direction error
Message.Description:
Task:
It's not possible to grip outward with an inward force.
Context:
Message.Actions:
1 Check gripper current or target pos.
2 Check gripping direction.

Message.Title: Hand not calibrated
Message.Description:
Task:
Hand_ is not calibrated.
Context:

Message.Title: Target pos exceeds the limit
Message.Description:
Task:
Hand_ has a wrong target pos.
Context:

Message.Title: Failed gripper moving
Message.Description:
Task:
Hand_ failed to move to assigned position.
Context:
Message.Actions:
1 Check whether gripper is blocked.
2 Check gripper's drive chain.

Message.Title: Gripping position error
Message.Description:
Task:
It seems Hand_ did not grip object in expected position.
Context:
Message.Actions:
1 Check target gripping pos.
2 Check robot pos.

Message.Title: Gripping direction error
Message.Description:
Task:
It's not possible to grip inward with an outward force.
Context:
Message.Actions:
1 Check gripper current or target pos.
2 Check gripping direction.
